result.arabic_text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۚ بَلۡ جَآءَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ
result.translation: Canke ku kuba bibwiye ko nya Ntumwa ari umusazi! Nibateshwe bate, ahubwo bahakana iyo Ntumwa kuko yabazaniye Qor’ani n’idini ry’ukuri rishingiye ku gusenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, kandi abenshi muri bo banka ukuri ku kubera ishari n’akarenganyo.
